sys_update_xml.name: sp_header_footer_e71decfcdbd637009a3a9c64db9619b2
sys_update_xml.payload: customc.navbar { background-color: $navbar-inverse-bg; border-radius: 0; border: 0; margin-bottom: 0; } .navbar-row { max-width: 1276px; margin: 0 auto; } .fa-home { font-size: 25px; color: $navbar-inverse-link-color; margin-left: 30px; } .navbar-subnav { width: 100%; height: auto; border-bottom: 1px solid $light-gray; background-color: $tier-2-background; } .subnav-container { height: 175px; } .center-logo { text-align: center; margin: 40px 0; } .header-list { margin-bottom: 0; display: flex; align-items: stretch; justify-content: center; width: 100%; } .header-list-item { padding-bottom: 21px; margin: 0 20px; display: block; flex: 0 1 auto; list-style-type: none; font-size: 20px; } .a-list-item { color: $tier-2-text; } .header-list-item:hover { color: $navbar-inverse-bg; border-bottom: 1.5px solid $navbar-inverse-bg; } .dropdown-toggle { height: 60px; } .dropdown-toggle:active, .open .dropdown-toggle { background: none !important; color: $brand-success !important; } .navbar-default .navbar-toggle { border-color: $navbar-inverse-link-color ! important; } .navbar-default .navbar-toggle .icon-bar { background-color: $navbar-inverse-link-color ! important; } .dropdown-menu { border-radius: 0; border-top: 0; } .label { display: inline; padding: 2px 5px; color: #fff; text-align: center; background-color: $brand-success; } .nav-item { color: $navbar-inverse-link-color !important; } .cond-show-item { display: none; } .navbar-brand { display: none; } .navbar-home-icon { display: block; float: left; padding: 20px 15px; font-size: 18px; line-height: 20px; height: 60px; } .navbar-default .navbar-nav > li > a { color: $navbar-inverse-link-color ! important; } .navbar-search { padding-top: 30px; padding-bottom: 30px; background-color: $tier-3-background; } // Typeahead search styling .input-typeahead { border: 1px solid $text-color !important; border-right: 0; border-radius: 0; font-weight: 400; font-size: 16px; color: $text-color ! important; } .input-group-btn { border: 0 !important; } .btn { border: 1px solid $text-color; border-left: 0; border-radius: 0 ! important; color: $text-color ! important; } .btn:hover { background-color: $navbar-inverse-bg !important; color: white; } .dropdown-menu { border: 0; border-radius: 0; border-top: 0; color: $text-color; } @media only screen and (max-width: 767px) { .navbar-home-icon { display: none; } .navbar-brand { display: block; } .navbar-subnav { display: none; } .cond-show-item { display: block; } .avatar-dropdown { color: #fff !important; } } sp_instancefalsethree-tier-esc-headerfalseThree Tier ESC Header[{"name":"search_title","section":"other","default_value":"Search","label":"Search Title","type":"string"}]falsefalsesp_header_footermadison.spina2019-06-24 22:21:08e71decfcdbd637009a3a9c64db9619b257Three Tier ESC Header3d1da2705b021200a4656ede91f91ab63d1da2705b021200a4656ede91f91ab6sp_header_footer_e71decfcdbd637009a3a9c64db9619b2madison.spina2019-06-25 14:34:00
